_sText:
Cs_Cluster - Hostage Rescue
By Xenocide_X Mail: Xenocidex@gmail.com
Coyote.moozer.com
HXXL.xom

Spawns: 32
Hostages: 2
Map Size: Small
Nav file: Included, Customized


This map was a big hit for cs1, featuring unique and fast paced gameplay. 
I got tired of seeing all the new official maps where all the action happened on one horizontal plane. No real vertical movement. Just huge 2D run arounds. 
This map is the antithesis of such gameplay. It's vertical, easy to find an enemy or objective, and lends itself to short rounds, without becoming an FY map. Snipers are crucial 

but not key, they can be defeated by a sneaky man with a shotgun if given the chance.


Thankyou for downloading, feel free to e-mail me or find me in the forums at coyote.moozer.com or hxxl.com.
Jeremiah
